item.title: Power Query Developer (Back End) - $3/hr. - Upwork
item.description:
Upwork Rate: $3/h
Job Summary:
We're hiring a Power Query Expert with five years of relevant experience to handle back-end data development. Your role involves using Power Query to transform and manage data sources efficiently.

DO NOT APPLY IF:
You want more than $3/h (offers above $3/h will be automatically rejected).
You expect a rate increase after starting (asking for more will automatically end your contract).
You don’t have at least 10 hours a week available regularly (if you are overloaded with work/commute/commitments, DO NOT APPLY).
You are looking for short-term work (less than 3 months). This is a long-term engagement.

Key Information About the Job:
This is a PART-TIME freelance position.
Irregular hours, from 0 to 10 hours a week, sometimes more if you have availability.
You MUST use our time-tracking system along with Upwork time tracking.
You MUST estimate effort for each task.
You MUST communicate progress, blockers, issues, and availability.
Hours of work will be agreed upon based on the project and your availability, with flexibility.
Begin your proposal with "INTERESTED" to show that you have read everything.
This is a 3-month position with the possibility of extension if you perform well, with 0 days’ notice on both sides.

ABOUT THE ROLE:
We are seeking a Power BI Report Developer with the following responsibilities:
Develop and maintain Power Query scripts for data extraction, transformation, and loading.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand data needs.
Design data models and relationships for reporting.
Optimize queries for performance.
Automate data processes for accuracy and timeliness.
Troubleshoot data issues and document processes.
Proficiency in Power Query/M.
Understanding of SQL and data concepts.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

We look forward to receiving your application!

Hourly Range: $3.00
Posted On: May 24, 2024 10:59 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:MySQL, Database, SQL, Microsoft Excel
Skills: MySQL, Database, SQL, Microsoft Excel
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Tableau Expert for Data Visualization Projects - Upwork
item.description:
5+ years of experience required

We are looking for an experienced Tableau expert to join our team and assist with data visualization projects. As a Tableau expert, you will be responsible for helping us create visually appealing and interactive dashboards and reports that effectively communicate complex data. Your main duties will include data analysis, designing and developing interactive dashboards, creating reports, and optimizing Tableau performance.

    To be successful in this role, you should have a strong understanding of data visualization principles, be proficient in Tableau software, and have excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.

    Responsibilities:
    - Analyzing data and identifying key insights
    - Designing and developing interactive dashboards and reports
    - Creating visualizations that effectively communicate complex data
    - Optimizing Tableau performance
    - Collaborating with team members to gather requirements and understand business objectives

    Requirements:
    - Proven experience as a Tableau expert
    - Proficiency in Tableau software
    - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
    - Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

    If you are a skilled Tableau expert and have a passion for data visualization, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$12.00
Posted On: May 24, 2024 10:35 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Tableau, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI
Skills: Tableau, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Power Bi developer - full time - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Power BI Developer

We are seeking a talented and experienced Power BI Developer to join our dynamic team as part of a Global Corporation. As a Power BI Developer, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining business intelligence solutions using Microsoft Power BI. This is an exciting opportunity for individuals who are passionate about data visualization and analytics.  

Successful candidates display strong analytical, problem-solving, organizational, and written/oral communication skills. The candidate should be a detail-oriented team member who can consistently meet deadlines and possess the ability to work independently as needed.

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and understand business needs
Design and develop Power BI reports and dashboards to provide insights and support decision-making
Optimize data models for performance and scalability
Implement data transformations and ETL processes
Ensure data accuracy and consistency within the Power BI environment
Provide technical support and troubleshooting for Power BI solutions
Will create and update Power BI Procedures specific to Project
Connecting various data sources to Power BI (Folder, Files, SharePoint folder, Azure, or such databases)
Deployment of Dashboard and Maintenance of Power BI Services for various clients within Workspace. Handling Admin activities of Power BI workspace.
Qualifications:

Any Graduate or Diploma/Power BI Certification preferred.
Must be able to multi-task and demonstrate the ability to work with a diverse work group of stakeholders.
Proven experience as a Power BI Developer or in a similar role
Knowledge of SQL and data modeling
Ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
Effective communication and teamwork abilities
Benefits:

Competitive salary and benefits package
Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in global corporation
Professional development and training opportunities
Collaborative and inclusive work environment
Potential for career growth and advancement
As part of Techsistem, we are proud to offer a competitive compensation package. This is determined by several factors, including performance, experience and skills, equity, regular job market evaluations. In addition to base pay, other compensation, such as an annual bonus or long-term incentive opportunities may be offered.

If you are a motivated individual with a passion for data analytics and visualization, we encourage you to apply for the Power BI Developer position. Join us in driving data-driven decision-making and making a meaningful impact on our organization.


Posted On: May 24, 2024 08:29 UTC
Category: Data Engineering
Skills:Tableau, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, SQL Server Integration Services, Data Extraction, Microsoft SQL Server Programming, Microsoft Power BI Development, Data Mining, Data Warehousing, Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services
Skills: Tableau, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, SQL Server Integration Services, Data Extraction, Microsoft SQL Server Programming, Microsoft Power BI Development, Data Mining, Data Warehousing, Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services
Country: Romania
click to apply

item.title: Title: Azure Data Factory API Connection Build - Hubspot  - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to build me a solution that connects my Hubspot data (entire schema) to my Azure SQL Database, with the ability to refresh automatically once a day. I have attempted to do this myself with the pre-built connectors but I do not think they work now, hence I need to develop a bespoke solution.
I am thinking that this solution can be built using demo account data from Hubspot to begin with, and then you can show me how to replace the demo account credentials with my actual Hubspot credentials.
My end goal for this is to have my Azure SQL database connected to Power BI (already achieved) to build custom visualisations. I just need the connection built.
If you think there is a better way to do this, then I am open to other suggestions.
Finally, there is plenty of scope with this piece should the job be completed in a satisfactory manner. My business has a requirement to build many connectors into our Azure environment in the near future.
Thank you,
Nick


Posted On: May 24, 2024 06:00 UTC
Category: Data Engineering
Skills:Python, Apache Airflow, SQL, Apache Superset, Databricks Platform, BigQuery, Snowflake, Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft SQL Server, API Integration, Microsoft Azure, Data Warehousing & ETL Software, PostgreSQL
Skills: Python, Apache Airflow, SQL, Apache Superset, Databricks Platform, BigQuery, Snowflake, Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft SQL Server, API Integration, Microsoft Azure, Data Warehousing & ETL Software, PostgreSQL
Country: Australia

item.title: Marketing Data Analyst - 100% Remote  - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced and highly skilled Marketing Data Analyst to join our dynamic marketing team. The ideal candidate will have a strong analytical background and be proficient in turning complex data into actionable insights to drive our marketing strategies.

Responsibilities  

Collect, analyze, and interpret data from various marketing channels, including digital, social media, email, and traditional advertising.
Develop and maintain marketing dashboards and reports to track campaign performance, KPIs, and ROI.
Conduct market research to identify trends, competitive analysis, and customer insights.
Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to understand business objectives and provide data-driven recommendations.
Perform A/B testing and analyze results to optimize marketing campaigns.
Utilize statistical methods and data visualization tools to present findings in a clear and actionable manner.
Monitor and report on key metrics such as customer acquisition, conversion rates, and customer lifetime value.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging analytics technologies.

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Statistics, Data Science, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Marketing Data Analyst or in a similar role.
Proficiency in data analysis tools such as SQL, R, Python, and Excel.
Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, or similar.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.
Knowledge of digital marketing channels and metrics.
Experience with web analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics).

Hourly Range: $8.00-$10.00
Posted On: May 24, 2024 04:29 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Marketing Strategy, Communications, Research & Strategy, Google Analytics, Data Analysis, Market Research, Analytics
Skills: Marketing Strategy, Communications, Research & Strategy, Google Analytics, Data Analysis, Market Research, Analytics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Data Scientist - Sports Analysis - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Data Scientist with expertise in creating categories and conducting analysis of sports, with a particular emphasis on hockey. As a Data Scientist, you will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting sports data to identify trends and insights that can be used to improve performance and decision-making in hockey. You will work with a wide range of data sources such as game statistics, player performance data, and scouting reports. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in data science, statistical analysis, and machine learning.

  Responsibilities:
  - Develop and implement advanced statistical and machine learning models to analyze sports data
  - Create and maintain data pipelines to collect and process sports data
  - Conduct exploratory data analysis to identify patterns and trends
  - Collaborate with stakeholders to define metrics and develop insights
  - Present findings and recommendations to both technical and non-technical audiences
  
  Skills:
  - Strong knowledge of statistical analysis and machine learning techniques
  - Proficient in Python and R programming languages
  - Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
  - Familiarity with sports analytics and hockey-specific data
  - Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail

  This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level Data Scientist who can work independently and deliver high-quality results within the given timeframe.


Posted On: May 24, 2024 03:17 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Data Analysis, Statistics, Data Science, Python, R
Skills: Data Analysis, Statistics, Data Science, Python, R
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Data Analyst (Marketing) - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
- Perform ad-hoc data analysis and light data engineering tasks to support the development of our data strategy and business intelligence offerings as an advertising studio.
- Familiarize yourself with our current tech stack and data pipelines, and work to advance these based on internal and client requirements.
- Function both as an individual contributor and a project manager, coordinating with specialized data science professionals as needed.

Requirements:
- Experience with marketing and/or business intelligence data (e.g., paid media, social media, web analytics, social listening).
- Proficiency with web APIs, data scraping providers, end-to-end data pipelines, and visualization tools such as Looker Studio and PowerBI.

Ad-Hoc Task Examples:
- Design new queries, requests, and data architectures with our scraping and API providers to meet data requirements.
- Develop pipelines and workflows for social media APIs and scraping providers (Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn, Twitter) to identify trends in performance data, social listening data, and organic content performance.
- Create custom formulas in Google Sheets and Google Scripts for non-technical team members to easily query databases.
- Develop new dashboards in Looker Studio and other visualization tools for internal and client use.
Assist in setting up client marketing tech stacks to ensure relevant data collection and visualization for business decisions.
- Support internal task automation.
Advance our data offerings through RFM, media mix, predictive, cluster, and attribution modeling workflows.


Hourly Range: $17.00-$50.00
Posted On: May 23, 2024 21:17 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Python, SQL, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Marketing Analytics
Skills: Python, SQL, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Marketing Analytics
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Remote Swarm Intelligence Engineer for New Startup  - Upwork
item.description:
Company Overview:
We are an innovative fin-tech startup dedicated to developing cutting-edge software solutions. We are seeking a talented Swarm Intelligence Engineer to join our remote team.

Job Description:
As a Swarm Intelligence Engineer, you will be responsible for implementing and optimizing swarm intelligence algorithms using existing libraries and tools. You will collaborate with our development and data science teams to integrate these solutions into our software platform efficiently and effectively.

Key Responsibilities:

• Utilize existing swarm intelligence libraries (e.g., DEAP, Pyswarm) to implement data analysis and optimization algorithms.
• Apply natural language processing (NLP) techniques and tools (e.g., NLTK, spaCy) for sentiment analysis.
• Develop and integrate Python-based services for swarm intelligence and NLP tasks into our Rust-based backend.
• Collaborate with Svelte engineers for frontend integration and Rust engineers for backend integration.
• Participate in Agile practices, including sprints, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives to ensure smooth collaboration.
• Monitor and refine implemented solutions based on performance metrics and user feedback.

Requirements:

• Proven experience as a software engineer or data scientist with expertise in applying swarm intelligence algorithms.
• Proficiency in Python for data analysis and machine learning tasks.
• Experience with NLP tools and techniques (e.g., NLTK, spaCy).
• Familiarity with data processing and message queue systems (e.g., Kafka, RabbitMQ).
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Ability to work effectively in a remote team environment.
• Experience with Agile methodologies and working in a sprint-based environment.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience with Svelte and Rust, or willingness to learn and integrate with these technologies.
• Experience with optimization algorithms and real-time data processing.
• Knowledge of machine learning techniques and libraries.
• Background in financial technology or related fields.

How to Apply:

item.content:encoded:
Company Overview:
We are an innovative fin-tech startup dedicated to developing cutting-edge software solutions. We are seeking a talented Swarm Intelligence Engineer to join our remote team.

Job Description:
As a Swarm Intelligence Engineer, you will be responsible for implementing and optimizing swarm intelligence algorithms using existing libraries and tools. You will collaborate with our development and data science teams to integrate these solutions into our software platform efficiently and effectively.

Key Responsibilities:

• Utilize existing swarm intelligence libraries (e.g., DEAP, Pyswarm) to implement data analysis and optimization algorithms.
• Apply natural language processing (NLP) techniques and tools (e.g., NLTK, spaCy) for sentiment analysis.
• Develop and integrate Python-based services for swarm intelligence and NLP tasks into our Rust-based backend.
• Collaborate with Svelte engineers for frontend integration and Rust engineers for backend integration.
• Participate in Agile practices, including sprints, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives to ensure smooth collaboration.
• Monitor and refine implemented solutions based on performance metrics and user feedback.

Requirements:

• Proven experience as a software engineer or data scientist with expertise in applying swarm intelligence algorithms.
• Proficiency in Python for data analysis and machine learning tasks.
• Experience with NLP tools and techniques (e.g., NLTK, spaCy).
• Familiarity with data processing and message queue systems (e.g., Kafka, RabbitMQ).
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Ability to work effectively in a remote team environment.
• Experience with Agile methodologies and working in a sprint-based environment.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience with Svelte and Rust, or willingness to learn and integrate with these technologies.
• Experience with optimization algorithms and real-time data processing.
• Knowledge of machine learning techniques and libraries.
• Background in financial technology or related fields.

How to Apply:
To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience.

item.title: Grafana Dashboard and Alerts Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced freelancer to create Grafana dashboards and alerts for our project. The main objective is to monitor and visualize the performance metrics of our system in real-time. The freelancer will be responsible for designing and implementing Grafana dashboards that provide insights into key performance indicators (KPIs), such as CPU usage, memory utilization, network traffic, and application response time. Additionally, the freelancer should be proficient in creating alerts based on defined thresholds to ensure timely notifications for any performance issues.

  Required Skills:
  - Proficiency in Grafana dashboard creation
  - Strong knowledge of data visualization techniques
  - Experience in setting up and configuring alerts in Grafana

  Size: Medium
  Duration: 1 to 3 months
  Expertise: Intermediate

item.title: Business Data Analyst for New Beginners. - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a Business Data Analyst for our team who is willing to work with new beginners in the field. As a Business Data Analyst, you will be responsible for analyzing large datasets, interpreting trends, and providing insights to drive business decisions. The ideal candidate should have a strong analytical mindset, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with a diverse team.

    Responsibilities:
    - Collect and analyze data from various sources
    - Identify patterns, trends, and correlations in datasets
    - Create reports and dashboards to present findings
    - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements

    Required skills:
    - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
    - Proficiency in data analysis tools such as Excel, SQL, or Python
    - Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI
    - Excellent communication and presentation skills

    This is a great opportunity for individuals who are new to the field of business data analysis and are looking to gain practical experience in a supportive environment.

item.title: WooCommerce, Google Ads, Bing Ads Development - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an expert in google ads, bing ads, and facebook ads to optimize our return on ad spend.   We are currently advertising on both Google and Bing and would like to expand to Facebook. We would also like optimization of Google Analytics to give us better data about funnels and where people are dropping off.  Although not required, creation of analytical dashboards allowing us to check certain statistics by region would be a plus.

Required Scope:

Expertise in WooCommerce
Creating Landing Pages for AB testing vs existing product pages and setting up AB testing

Google and Bing Ads, including
Auto-apply recommendations
Optimization of separate ad groups
Optimisation of Bid strategy
Best practices including search partners and display networks
Improvement and AB testing of Ad headlines and descriptions
Device Optimization
Proper conversion tracking and attribution (right now only about half of sales are attributed to a paid search but we suspect it should be 75 to 80%)

Google Analytics
Funnel creation and tracking exit data
Retarget non-converted users
Linking data to reports

Preferred Additional Scope:
PowerBI/Tableau or equivalent dashboards hosted by firm with free client viewer
Allow client to slice by state or multiple states simultaneously to see:
Google traffic
Conversions (provided by our data)
Slice time frames
(Right now we manage this last scope with Google spreadsheets and compare our shipping charges with conversion by region, taking data and manually pasting it in.  We would like this be real time and sliceable by us. )


Hourly Range: $10.00-$35.00
Posted On: May 23, 2024 18:27 UTC
Category: Search Engine Marketing
Skills:Google Ads, Google Analytics, Search Engine Marketing, Pay Per Click Advertising, PPC Campaign Setup & Management, Bing Ads, Display Ad, Google Tag Manager, SEO Keyword Research, WooCommerce

item.title: Experienced PowerBI Data Visualization Expert Needed for Asset Health Monitoring Project - Upwork
item.description:
am seeking an experienced PowerBI expert to assist in completing an advanced data visualization dashboard for an Asset Health Monitoring project I am leading. This project involves monitoring the health and performance of various assets using real-time data to ensure optimal functioning and early detection of potential issues.

Project Overview:

Data Preparation: Extensive data planning and preparation have already been completed.
Objective: Create a sophisticated and user-friendly dashboard that provides clear insights into asset health and performance.
Data Sources: The data includes real-time sensor readings, maintenance logs, historical performance data, and other relevant metrics.
Responsibilities:

Dashboard Design and Development: Utilize PowerBI to design and develop interactive and visually appealing dashboards.
Data Integration: Integrate various data sources into the PowerBI dashboard, ensuring seamless data flow and accuracy.
Advanced Visualization: Create advanced visualizations that effectively communicate complex data insights, including charts, graphs, and KPIs.
User Experience: Ensure the dashboard is intuitive and user-friendly, allowing stakeholders to easily navigate and understand the data.
Performance Optimization: Optimize the dashboard for performance, ensuring fast load times and responsiveness.
Testing and Validation: Conduct thorough testing to ensure data accuracy and reliability.
Documentation and Training: Provide documentation and, if necessary, training to end-users on how to use and interpret the dashboard.
Qualifications:

Proven experience with PowerBI, including advanced data visualization and dashboard development.
Strong understanding of data integration and transformation processes.
Ability to create visually appealing and intuitive dashboards.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Experience with real-time data monitoring and asset health management is a plus.
Strong communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.
How to Apply:

Please submit your proposal with the following:

A brief overview of your experience with PowerBI and data visualization.
Examples of previous PowerBI dashboards you have developed.
Your availability and estimated timeline for completing the project.
Your hourly rate or project-based pricing.
I look forward to working with a talented professional who can help bring this project to life and deliver a powerful tool for monitoring asset health. Thank you for your interest!

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00
Posted On: May 23, 2024 18:22 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Data Analysis Expressions, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Data Visualization
Skills: Dashboard, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Data Analysis Expressions, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Data Visualization
Country: Canada

item.title: Setting up a Power BI data lake - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced Data Infrastructure Specialist to help us build a robust data lake. This data lake will integrate data from our primary software platforms—Service Titan, UKG, Sage Intacct, and Podium—and will be used to create insightful dashboards and analyses in Power BI.

Initially, we are looking for someone to help us get started by advising how we begin to setup our data lake. We will show you our current platforms and what we are trying to build; we need you to advise us on immediate next steps.

There could be a longer-term advisory role available depending on how this initial consulting engagement goes.

In your reply, please include specific examples of how you consulted with companies to get them started on the road to self-sufficiency. I am not looking to see examples of dashboards you built; if I see those, I will not consider your application.

Hourly Range: $50.00-$75.00

item.title: Data Visualization - Dubai Map Driving Time - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled data visualization expert to create visualizations of Dubai map driving time. The project involves calculating the driving time from multiple origin locations (1 to 3 locations) to up to 20 different destination locations in Dubai. The visualizations should effectively display the driving time information and provide insights into the travel distances and durations.

Tool will need to have date, and hour filters, origin and destination should be manual annual if changes are needed. 3rd party tools like tom tom move can be used if this is advised as the best option.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI
- Strong knowledge of geospatial data analysis
- Experience with mapping tools and APIs
- Ability to work with large datasets
- Attention to detail and ability to present complex data in a clear and concise manner



Budget: $75
Posted On: May 23, 2024 17:11 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Tableau

item.title: Power Apps Developer with Field Service and Business Central Experience - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Power Apps developer with experience in Field Service and Business Central. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Power Apps development and the ability to design and build custom solutions using Field Service and Business Central. This role will involve collaborating with our team to gather requirements, develop and test applications, and provide ongoing support.

    Responsibilities:
    - Develop, customize, and integrate Power Apps solutions
    - Design and implement Field Service and Business Central functionalities
    - Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements
    - Test and debug applications to ensure smooth functionality
    - Provide ongoing support and maintenance for Power Apps applications


    Requirements:
    - Proven experience as a Power Apps developer
    - Strong knowledge of Field Service and Business Central
    - Proficient in Power Apps development and customization
    - Experienced with Power BI reporting and Analytics
    - Familiarity with data integrations and plugin development
    - Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

    If you are a talented Power Apps developer with expertise in Field Service and Business Central, we'd love to hear from you. This is a great opportunity to work on exciting projects and be part of a dynamic team.

item.title: Active Campaign to create a custom Sales Dashboard - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Active Campaign expert to create a custom sales dashboard. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Active Campaign and be adept at designing and implementing dashboards that effectively track key performance indicators (KPIs).
Project Details:
Phase 1 - Sales Dashboard:
Objective: Build custom dashboards in Active Campaign to track different KPIs.
Scope:
Develop a user-friendly and visually appealing dashboard.
Integrate and configure the necessary KPIs as detailed in the attached sheet.
Ensure real-time data accuracy and seamless updates.
Ensure the dashboard is easily accessible and understandable for our sales team.
KPIs to Track:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FMltTmBB86Hq6QlMs9eyrUrvfyE6m5fXdcgkx_FTThI/edit?usp=sharing
Requirements:
Proven experience with Active Campaign, particularly in dashboard creation and KPI tracking.
Strong understanding of sales processes and metrics.
Ability to design intuitive and interactive dashboards.
Excellent communication skills to understand our specific needs and provide ongoing support.
Detail-oriented and capable of working independently to deliver high-quality results.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$45.00

Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, ActiveCampaign, Sales Analytics, CRM Software

item.title: Data Analyst - KPI Dashboard Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Data Analyst to help us create a dynamic KPI dashboard using our raw data. We run a veterinary clinic and export our Daily Sales data which is an uncleaned dataset that includes all the invoices, amounts and clients per week. We would like to create a running KPI dashboard that tracks the following per week: Patient volume (number of clients/patients treated), average bill, top 10 clients and the respective amounts spent and day-to-day revenue.

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data analysis and visualization, and will be able to transform complex data sets into clear and insightful visualizations. The main responsibilities will include gathering and cleaning the data, identifying key performance indicators (KPIs), and designing and implementing the dashboard.

The successful candidate should have expertise in data analysis tools such as Excel, Tableau, or Power BI. Strong attention to detail and the ability to communicate findings effectively are also essential for this role. We would be happy with any solution that would give us the ability to upload a weekly CSV file and have it automatically update our KPI dashboard with good visualisations.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: May 23, 2024 14:40 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel, Tableau, Looker Studio
Skills: Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel, Tableau, Looker Studio
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
